# NSInferMappingModelAutomaticallyOption

**Global Variable**

Key to attempt to create the mapping model automatically.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSInferMappingModelAutomaticallyOption: String
```

## Discussion

The corresponding value is an `NSNumber` object. If the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber/boolValue] of the number is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] and the value of the `NSMigratePersistentStoresAutomaticallyOption` is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the coordinator will attempt to infer a mapping model if none can be found.

## Constants

- **NSIgnorePersistentStoreVersioningOption**: Key to ignore the built-in versioning provided by Core Data.
- **NSMigratePersistentStoresAutomaticallyOption**: Key to automatically attempt to migrate versioned stores.
